descriptions:
Introducing our Squirrel House/Nesting Box, perfect for your outdoor space! Made from durable Cedar wood, this nesting box is designed to provide a safe and cozy home for squirrels. 

With its sturdy construction, featuring both glued and nailed components, you can trust that this squirrel house will last for years to come. It also comes with a removable roof, making it easy for you to clean and maintain.

One of its unique features is the burned image of a squirrel, beautifully created by artist Drew Senesac. This decorative touch adds a charming element to your garden while attracting squirrels to their new home.

Measuring at 12 inches wide, 11 inches tall, and 10 inches deep on the outside, and 5.75 inches wide and 9 inches deep on the inside, this nesting box provides ample space for squirrels to nest comfortably. The squirrel opening has a diameter of 3.5 inches, ensuring easy access for our furry friends.

Mounting this squirrel house is a breeze, with two pre-drilled holes and included mounting hardware, including screws and washers. You'll have it securely installed in no time!

Give our Squirrel House/Nesting Box a try and create a welcoming habitat for squirrels in your outdoor space. They'll thank you for it!

Introducing the Squirrel House/Nesting Box! This beautifully crafted cedar wood box is designed specifically for outdoor use. The sturdy construction ensures durability, with glued and nailed joints for added stability. 

Featuring a charming burned image of a squirrel by renowned artist Drew Senesac, this nesting box adds a delightful touch to any backyard. The removable roof makes it easy to clean and maintain, ensuring a comfortable and safe space for our furry friends.

Mounting hardware is included, with pre-drilled holes for easy installation. Simply use the included screws and washers to securely attach the box to your desired location.

The dimensions of the Squirrel House/Nesting Box are as follows: 12 inches in width, 11 inches in height, and 10 inches in depth on the outside. The inside measures 5.75 inches in width and 9 inches in depth. The squirrel opening has a diameter of 3.5 inches, providing a perfect entrance for our squirrel friends.

Designed with ease of use in mind, this Squirrel House/Nesting Box is perfect for elderly folks who may be easily confused. Give our furry friends a cozy home with this high-quality and accessible nesting box.

Introducing the Squirrel House/Nesting Box! 

Are you looking to provide a cozy and safe haven for your furry friends? Our Squirrel House/Nesting Box is the perfect solution for you. 

Made from durable Cedar wood, this squirrel house is designed for outdoor use, ensuring that your little visitors feel right at home in their natural habitat. The construction of this house is top-notch, with glued and nailed joints for added strength and durability. 

Featuring a beautiful burned image of a squirrel by the talented artist Drew Senesac, this house adds a touch of artistry to your garden or backyard. The removable roof allows for easy cleaning and maintenance, ensuring a comfortable living space for the squirrels. 

Mounting hardware, including screws and washers, is included with the box, making installation a breeze. With pre-drilled holes and secure fastening, you can easily mount this house wherever you desire. 

Let's talk dimensions! The outside measurements of the house are 12 inches in width, 11 inches in height, and 10 inches in depth. The inside dimensions are 5.75 inches in width and 9 inches in depth. The squirrel opening has a diameter of 3.5 inches, providing the perfect size for our little furry friends to enter and exit comfortably. 

Don't miss out on this opportunity to create a welcoming environment for squirrels in your backyard. Get your Squirrel House/Nesting Box today and enjoy watching these adorable creatures make themselves at home!

With its sturdy construction, including glued and nailed joints, you can trust that this squirrel house will withstand the elements. Plus, it features a charming burned image of a squirrel, created by the talented artist Drew Senesac, adding a decorative touch to your garden.

The removable roof makes it easy to clean and maintain the squirrel house, ensuring a hygienic environment for the squirrels. Mounting hardware is included, with pre-drilled holes for easy installation. You'll receive screws and washers to securely attach the squirrel house wherever you choose.

The dimensions of the squirrel house are designed with squirrels in mind. The outside measures 12 inches in width, 11 inches in height, and 10 inches in depth. The inside provides a comfortable space with a width of 5.75 inches and a depth of 9 inches. The squirrel opening has a diameter of 3.5 inches, allowing easy access for our squirrel friends.

Don't miss out on providing a cozy home for squirrels in your backyard! Get the Squirrel House/Nesting Box today and enjoy the delightful sight of squirrels making themselves at home.

Made from durable cedar wood, this nesting box is designed for outdoor use, ensuring the safety and comfort of squirrels. The sturdy construction, with glued and nailed joints, guarantees durability and stability.

Featuring a beautifully burned image of a squirrel designed by the talented artist Drew Senesac, this nesting box adds a touch of charm to any backyard. The removable roof allows for easy cleaning and maintenance, ensuring a hygienic and cozy home for our squirrel friends. 

Mounting hardware is included, with pre-drilled holes for easy installation. The package includes 2 screws and 2 washers to securely attach the nesting box to a desired location.

- Outside: Width - 12 inches, Height - 11 inches, Depth - 10 inches
- Inside: Width - 5.75 inches, Depth - 9 inches

With its thoughtfully designed features and dimensions, this Squirrel House/Nesting Box provides a safe and comfortable home for squirrels while adding a decorative touch to your outdoor space.

Give our furry friends a place to call home with the Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Order now and make your backyard a haven for squirrels!

Introducing the Squirrel House/Nesting Box! 

Are you a nature lover who enjoys observing squirrels in your backyard? Our Squirrel House/Nesting Box is the perfect addition to your outdoor space. 

Crafted from durable cedar wood, this nesting box is designed to withstand the elements and provide a safe and cozy home for squirrels. With its glued and nailed construction, you can trust that this box is built to last. 

Featuring a beautiful burned image of a squirrel, created by the talented artist Drew Senesac, this nesting box adds a decorative touch to your backyard. 

The removable roof allows for easy cleaning and maintenance, ensuring a comfortable living environment for the squirrels. Plus, all the necessary mounting hardware, including screws and washers, is included, making installation a breeze. 

With dimensions of 12 inches in width, 11 inches in height, and 10 inches in depth on the outside, and 5.75 inches in width and 9 inches in depth on the inside, this nesting box provides ample space for squirrels to nest and raise their young. The squirrel opening has a diameter of 3.5 inches, allowing easy access for the squirrels. 

Don't miss out on the opportunity to bring the beauty of nature right to your backyard with our Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Get yours today and enjoy watching squirrels thrive in their new home!
